member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearBrushRemapTable
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearBrushRemapTable method clears the brush color-remap table of this ImageAttributes object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey method clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color key is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix method clears the color-adjustment matrix for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment matrix is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearGamma
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearGamma method disables gamma correction for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which gamma correction is disabled. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp method clears the NoOp setting for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the NoOp setting is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel method clears the cyan-magenta-yellow-black (CMYK) output channel setting for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the output channel setting is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannelColorProfile method clears the output channel color profile setting for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the output channel profile setting is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearRemapTable method clears the color-remap table for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the remap table is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold method clears the threshold value for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the threshold is cleared. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.Clone
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.Clone method makes a copy of thisImageAttributes object.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the newImageAttributes object.

member.name: ImageAttributes.GetAdjustedPalette
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.GetAdjustedPalette method adjusts the colors in a palette according to the adjustment settings of a specified category.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that on input, contains the palette to be adjusted and, on output, receives the adjusted palette.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category whose adjustment settings will be applied to the palette.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the nature of this ImageAttributes object's most recent method failure.

returns.para: The ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If no methods invoked on thisImageAttributes object have failed since the previous call to ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus, then ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus returns .

If at least one method invoked on thisImageAttributes object has failed since the previous call to ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus, then ImageAttributes.GetLastStatus returns a value that indicates the nature of the most recent failure.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ImageAttributes
member.summary: Creates an ImageAttributes.ImageAttributes object. This is the default constructor.

member.summary: Creates an ImageAttributes.ImageAttributes object. This is the default constructor.

member.name: ImageAttributes.ImageAttributes
member.summary: Creates an ImageAttributes.ImageAttributes object. This is the default constructor.

member.name: ImageAttributes.Reset
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.Reset method clears all color- and grayscale-adjustment settings for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which color adjustment is reset. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable method sets the color remap table for the brush category.
member.param: INT that specifies the number of elements in the map array.
Pointer to an array of structures.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices method sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for a specified category.
member.param: Pointer to a 5×5 color-adjustment matrix.
Pointer to a 5×5 grayscale-adjustment matrix.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices. The default value is .
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices are set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix method sets the color-adjustment matrix for a specified category.
member.param: Pointer to a 5×5 color-adjustment matrix.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment matrix.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment matrix is set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetGamma
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetGamma method sets the gamma value for a specified category.
member.param: REAL number that specifies the gamma value.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the gamma value is set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetNoOp
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetNoOp method turns off color adjustment for a specified category. You can call to reinstate the color-adjustment settings that were in place before the call to ImageAttributes.SetNoOp.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which color correction is turned off. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel method sets the CMYK output channel for a specified category.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the output channel.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the output channel is set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile method sets the output channel color-profile file for a specified category.
member.param: Path name of a color-profile file. If the color-profile file is in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color directory, then this parameter can be the file name. Otherwise, this parameter must be the fully qualified path name.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the output channel color-profile file is set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable method sets the color-remap table for a specified category.
member.param: INT that specifies the number of elements in the map array.
Pointer to an array of structures that defines the color map.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color-remap table is set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetThreshold
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetThreshold method sets the threshold (transparency range) for a specified category.
member.param: REAL number that specifies the threshold value.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color threshold is set. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetToIdentity
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetToIdentity method sets the color-adjustment matrix of a specified category to identity matrix.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment matrix is set to identity. The default value is .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode
member.summary: The ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode method sets the wrap mode of thisImageAttributes object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.

Reference to a Color object that specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image. This color is visible if the wrap parameter is set to and the source rectangle passed to DrawImage is larger than the image itself. The default value is Color(), which is a Color object initialized to black.
This parameter has no effect in GDI+ version 1.0. Set this parameter to FALSE. The default value is FALSE.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns , which is an element of the Status enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
